 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמַהּ‎</span>] **verb** ==be astounded, dumbfounded== (Late Hebrew id.; so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּמַהּ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמָ֑הוּ‎</span> [[Ps.48.6|Ps 48:6]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְמֶהּ‎</span> [[Eccl.5.7|Eccl 5:7]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְמְהוּ‎</span> [[Job.26.11|Job 26:11]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמָ֑הוּ‎</span> [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]]; [[Hab.1.5|Hab 1:5]] — ***be astounded*** [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]]; [[Hab.1.5|Hab 1:5]] (see Hithpa\`el), [[Jer.4.9|Jer 4:9]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמם‎</span>, Niph\`al), [[Ps.48.6|Ps 48:6]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> causative [[Job.26.11|Job 26:11]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> of thing at which [[Exod.5.7|Exod 5:7]] ***look in astonishment*** at <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ אֶלרֵֿעֵהוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Gen.43.33|Gen 43:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Isa.13.8|Isa 13:8]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperative*** masculine plural + **Qal** ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתַּמְּהוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמָהוּ‎</span> [[Hab.1.5|Hab 1:5]] (see above), literally ***astonish yourselves, be astounded*** but [[BDB#We|We]] **Hithpalpel** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמַהְמְהוּ‎</span>; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] reads infinitive absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמַהַּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Marti|Marti]] and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְמָהוּ‎</span>) for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תמהו‎</span>.
